## From Our Family to Yours
Blending from multiple vineyards to create our West Hills signature Estate Pinot Noir we are able to use each site's diversity to produce this crowd pleasing wine. Let this be the taste that sparks memories for years to come of gatherings large and small enjoyed with those you love. $38.00
[All wines are currently available  
for in-person sales only.
